commands.description: Update the threads manually with adding missing users
commands.error: This command can only be used in or for a thread.

help.all: - `/update all`: to add on all threads of the guild.
help.desc: Update the threads manually with adding missing users, using these commands:
help.description: Show the help of the command
help.name: help
help.thread: - `/update thread <thread>`: to update a specific thread (select it from the list). If no channel is selected, use where the command is used.
help.title: Manual commands help

commands.name: update

updateAllThreads.description: Update all threads with adding missing users
updateAllThreads.name: all

updateSpecificThread.description: Update a specific thread with adding missing users

updateThread.description: Update this thread with adding missing users

archived.enable: Archived thread are now included in the update.

channel.description: Enable or disable the adding of members when channel, forum, or category permission are changed.
channel.name: On channel, forum or category update
channel.title: Channel, category, forum

disable.description: Enable or disable all events to switch the bot to manual or automatic mode
disable.name: Manual mode

log.description: View bot logs on a channel (use /log to choose channel)
log.name: Bot logs

main.description: Edit the server configuration. Allow to disable / enable some events
main.name: config

general.desc: General configuration of the bot (language and logs)

display.desc: Display of general configuration and change of parameters
display.title: display

general.title: general

channel.desc: Channel where to send the logs
channel.success: The logs channel is now {{- channel}}.
channel.title: log

log.desc: Choose the channel to send the logs

updateArchived.desc: "Update the thread even if it's archived"
updateArchived.name: update_archived

roleIn.error: You can't combine follow role-in with only-role or only-channel
roleIn.name: [Mode] - Follow [@role] in [#channel]

menu.description:
The bot can be activated on:
- Changing the permission of a member, a channel, a category or forum
- When a thread is created,
- When a new member arrives.

You can also disable all update, and follow only some channel or roles.

 The configuration commands are:
menu.title: Configuration

follow.description: Update only on the followed role/channels
follow.disabled: You can't use these commands : the follow-only mode is disabled.

list.description: Display the followed channels or roles
list.title: Follow

roleIn.description: Follow a role for a channel

option.channel: The channel to follow. If not specified, the role will be unfollowed.

thread.description: Select a thread, channel, forum, category, to follow

ignore.error: The channel, thread, forum or category was not recognized.
ignore.followError: The ignore commands can't be used under the follow-only mode.

list.description: List all ignored channels, threads, categories and role
list.title: List of ignored channels, categories, threads and roles

ignore.name: Ignore

roleIn.description: Ignore a channel for a specific role

option.chan: The channel where the role will be ignored. If not set, will delete the role from list.

thread.error: This command can only be used for a thread, channel, forum or category.

option.description: Select channel, thread, forum or category to ignore or to un-ignore

info.cmds: Get some information about the bot
info.desc: A little discord bot write in TypeScript that automatically add / remove member in thread, without pinging them!
info.title: Information

updated.noRole: {{- user}} has been updated but no role has been added.`
updated.roleList: {{- user}} has been updated with roles: {{- role}}

roleIn.already: The role {{- mention }} is already {{- opposite }} in {{- channel }}.

enabled.chan: {{- chan }} is now {{- on}} for {{- mention}}

error.need: You need to activate the follow-only-in mode first.
error.otherMode: You can't use this command with the other follow-only mode.
error.support: This channel type is not supported

noLonger.any: The role {{- mention}} is no longer {{- on}} in any channel.
noLonger.chan: {{- chan }} is no longer {{- on }} for {{- mention }}
